name: EKVirtualConferenceDescriptor
desc: Details about a virtual conference that uses a custom room type.

items.name: init(title: String?, urlDescriptors: [EKVirtualConferenceURLDescriptor], conferenceDetails: String?)
items.desc: Creates an object that describes a virtual conference, including a name and URL to join the conference.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The user-visible name of the virtual conference.

items.name: var urlDescriptors: [EKVirtualConferenceURLDescriptor]
items.desc: An array that contains objects with details about where to join the virtual conference.

items.name: class EKVirtualConferenceURLDescriptor
items.desc: Details about how users join a virtual conference, including a title and URL.

items.name: var conferenceDetails: String?
items.desc: Additional information about the conference that users may find helpful.
